Experience

Kapama has a variety of luxurious lodges – all located within the beautiful Kapama Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa: River Lodge, Karula, Buffalo Camp & Southern Camp.
Kapama River Lodge is the largest private game lodge in the Greater Kruger region, making this the ideal bush retreat for larger groups or families. Only a short drive from Hoedspruit airport, Kapama River Lodge is the perfect getaway for guests hoping to limit their travel time.

Stay

Kapama River Lodge comprises 40 standard suites, 16 spa suites, 4 family suites & 2 royal suites.
The standard suites are 35 sq metre each & includes air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom. The 50 sq metre spa suites feature magnificent floor-to-ceiling glass doors & frameless windows that offer expansive views – even from your bathroom.
The family suites are 70 sq metre each & are ideal for families since there is ample space to add extra beds for the little ones. The 40 sq metre royal suites include a private lounge, spacious patio & en-suite bathroom with dual showers overlooking the surrounding bush & resident wildlife.
The main lodge features a relaxing lounge, dining room, bar, wine cellar, open-air boma & dry riverbed where many nights are spent dining under the stars.

Activities

Kapama River Lodge will take guests on morning & evening safari drives in open 4x4 vehicles. This amazing reserve can also be experienced on foot.
At Kapama, luxury & comfort go hand & hand. Invigorating spa treatments at the wellness spa will allow guests to relax in a remote & tranquil setting with nothing but the sounds of the wild in the background.
Hot air balloon safaris, photographic workshops & romantic sleep-outs can also be arranged at an additional cost.
